example.name: intransitive
example.text: If [*-1] positioned over the brain 's motor-control area , the hand-held electromagnets generate nerve impulses that [*T*-309] zip down motor nerves and activate muscles , [*] making , say , a finger twitch .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'zip' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: zip_up

roles.note: 'zip up' probably won't occur with multiple arg1s, as just 'zip' may.

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia, 9/2010. Member of Vncls tape-22.4 (well, actually, just 'zip' is. This sense sans 'up' will probably need to be added ad some point). Ditto FN.

example.name: must have thought he was a burrito
example.text: Jaime zipped up his sleeping bag right before getting eaten by a bear.
example.arg: right before getting eaten by a bear
